Uses of Class
Card

    • Uses of Card in <Unnamed>

      Subclasses of Card in <Unnamed> 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BigTwoCard
      The BigTwoCard class is a subclass of the Card class, and is used to model a card used in a Big Two card game.
      Methods in <Unnamed> that return Card 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Card CardList.getCard(int i)
      Returns the card at the specified position in this list.
      Card Quad.getTopCard()
      Returns the top card of this hand
      Card FullHouse.getTopCard()
      Returns the top card of this hand
      Card Hand.getTopCard()
      A method for retrieving the top card of this hand.

      Removes the card at the specified position in this list.

      Replaces the card at the specified position in this list with the specified card.
      Methods in <Unnamed> with parameters of type Card 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Appends the specified card to the end of this list.

      Adds the specified card to this player.
